lead_paragraph: Roger Federer beat Ivo Karlovic, 6-3, 4-6, 6-3, yesterday to reach the third round of the Paris Masters and earn a chance to avenge a recent loss to David Nalbandian. Nalbandian, a 6-4, 6-4 winner over Carlos Moyá, beat Federer to win the Madrid Masters on Oct. 21 and has won both times the two have met in a final.
